title: Torotoro no Koi
description:
A collection of stories:
1. Nyan2
2-8. Dorodoro to Koi (Syrupy Love)
9. Koi ni Kakero
10. Momo to Iinchou
11. Shouganai Kimi
12. Shouganai Watashi

[u]Syrupy Love[/u]: Misaki discovers a new face of her classmate Tsubasa  that no one at her school knows about. But she isn't aware of Tsubasa's dysfunctional family life, which could spells trouble for their newfound relationship.
